## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Box](./harp-utils.math2d.box.md) | Alternative 2D box object with less memory impact (four numbers instead of two min/max objects with two numbers each). Should be faster. |

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [computeSquaredLineLength(line)](./harp-utils.math2d.computesquaredlinelength.md) | Computes the squared length of a line. |
|  [distSquared(ax, ay, bx, by)](./harp-utils.math2d.distsquared.md) | Compute squared distance between two 2D points <code>a</code> and <code>b</code>. |
|  [distToSegmentSquared(px, py, l0x, l0y, l1x, l1y)](./harp-utils.math2d.disttosegmentsquared.md) | Compute squared distance between a 2D point and a 2D line segment. |
